name: Corn Sugar
notes: Use corn sugar for priming the beer

name: Dry Malt Extract
notes: Dry malt extract is max 65% fermentable (relative to corn sugar) if fresh.  If the DME is not fresh you should reduce this by about 10%

name: Honey
notes: Honey is highly fermentable, but can take a very long time to reach full carbonation

name: Keg
notes: Keg with forced carbonation which is the method used by most home brewers with kegs

name: Keg with Corn Sugar
notes: Naturally carbonate the beer using corn sugar

name: Keg with Table Sugar
notes: Use table sugar to naturally carbonate the keg

name: Table Sugar
notes: Table sugar has no water and is slightly more effective than corn sugar
